oai_dc:dc.dc:title: West Nashville Baptist Church, 2001 May 30
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of West Nashville Baptist Church located at 5303 Pennsylvania Avenue in the West Nashville neighborhood of Nashville, Tennessee. This church first appears in the city directories in 1950. In 1977 the address changed to 5305 Pennsylvania Avenue. The original portion of the building is made of brick. The front addition was constructed from concrete block. The tar shingle roof is gabled and hipped. The windows are clear glass. The doors are metal and wood. Forms part of the Historic Nashville, Inc. Sacred Sites Survey Project. 1 photograph : col. ; 4 x 6 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: West Nashville Baptist Church (Nashville, Tenn.)
